name: Centrifuge
description: Centrifuge is a Puzzle Platformer made by Reddo in 2 days for the GMTK Game Jam of 2018. It's a Platformer where the player isn't able to move an inch by himself, instead the A and D keys rotate the gravity around 90° at a time in order to reach the goal! As of the latest build there are 10 levels in total.
